General.title: The Rust Programming Language
General.desc: Comprehensive guide to the Rust standard library APIs

General.title: Rust By Example
General.desc: A collection of runnable examples that illustrate various Rust concepts and standard libraries

General.title: The Rust Reference
General.desc: The primary reference for the Rust programming language

General.title: Rust Language Cheat Sheet
General.desc: A single-page Rust resource for people who like high information density

General.title: The Edition Guide
General.desc: Guide to the Rust editions, and migration from one to another

General.title: Rust Cookbook
General.desc: A collection of simple examples that demonstrate good practices to accomplish common programming tasks, using the crates of the Rust ecosystem

General.title: The `rustdoc` Book
General.desc: A book about Rust's documentation generator

General.title: The Rust Performance Book
General.desc: This book contains many techniques that can improve the speed and memory usage of Rust programs

Cargo & `rustc`.title: The Cargo Book
Cargo & `rustc`.desc: A book on Rust's package manager and build system. Contains a guide and a reference

Cargo & `rustc`.title: Guide to Rustc Development
Cargo & `rustc`.desc: A guide to rustc's internals and development process

Cargo & `rustc`.title: Rust Compiler Error Index
Cargo & `rustc`.desc: In-depth explanations of the errors you may see from the Rust compiler

Unstable & Unsafe.title: The Unstable Book
Unstable & Unsafe.desc: Documentation for unstable features that can only be used with nightly Rust

Unstable & Unsafe.title: The Rustonomicon
Unstable & Unsafe.desc: The dark arts of advanced and unsafe Rust programming

Embedded.title: The Embedded Rust Book
Embedded.desc: An introductory book about using Rust on "bare metal" embedded systems, such as microcontrollers

Embedded.title: Discovery
Embedded.desc: An introductory course on microcontroller-based embedded systems that uses Rust as the teaching language

Embedded.title: The Embedonomicon
Embedded.desc: A book on creating `#![no_std]` applications for embedded environments

CLI.title: Command Line Applications in Rust
CLI.desc: A tutorial for creating CLI applications in Rust

Async.title: Asynchronous Programming in Rust
Async.desc: A comprehensive guide to Rust's asynchronous programming libraries and language features

Web.title: Rust and WebAssembly
Web.desc: A tutorial and reference for using Rust and WebAssembly together
